import React from 'react'; const Skills = () => { const skillCategories = [ { title: "Programming Languages", icon: "üíª", skills: [ { name: "Python", description: "Proficient - AI/ML, Backend, Data Science" }, { name: "JavaScript", description: "Proficient - Full-stack Development" }, { name: "TypeScript", description: "Proficient - Frontend, Type Safety" }, { name: "SQL", description: "Intermediate - Complex Joins, Subqueries" }, { name: "C++", description: "Intermediate - Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming" } ] }, { title: "AI/ML", icon: "ü§ñ", skills: [ { name: "Machine Learning", description: "Experience working with models such as Random Forest, Logistic Regression, and Neural Networks" }, { name: "Natural Language Processing", description: "Text Processing, Sentiment Analysis" }, { name: "RAG Systems", description: "Retrieval-Augmented Generation and Vector Databases for grounded knowledge" }, { name: "LangChain", description: "LLM Integration, Agent Development" } ] }, { title: "Development Tools", icon: "üåê", skills: [ { name: "Google Cloud Platform", description: "Cloud Services, API access"}, { name: "Vercel", description: "Frontend Deployment, CI/CD"}, { name: "VS Code", description: "Primary IDE, Extensions"}, { name: "Git/Github", description: "Version Control, Collaboration"}, ] }, { title: "Web Development", icon: "üåê", skills: [ { name: "React", level: 90, description: "Component Development, State Management" }, { name: "Flask", level: 85, description: "Backend API, CORS Handling" }, { name: "HTML/CSS", level: 95, description: "Responsive Design, Modern Layouts" } ] }, { title: "Tools & Frameworks", icon: "üõ†Ô∏è", skills: [ { name: "React", level: 95, description: "Primary IDE, Extensions" }, { name: "Flask", level: 80, description: "UI/UX Design, Prototyping" }, { name: "Canva", level: 85, description: "Graphic Design, Marketing Materials" }, { name: "Streamlit", level: 75, description: "Rapid Prototyping, Data Apps" }, { name: "MCP Servers", level: 70, description: "Model Context Protocol" } ] }, { title: "Leadership & Soft Skills", icon: "üë•", skills: [ { name: "Team Leadership", level: 90, description: "Managing cross-functional teams" }, { name: "Event Management", level: 95, description: "400+ attendee symposiums" }, { name: "Public Speaking", level: 85, description: "Technical presentations, workshops" }, { name: "Project Management", level: 80, description: "Agile methodologies, planning" }, { name: "Mentoring", level: 85, description: "Teaching, knowledge sharing" } ] } ]; const certifications = [ { name: "Google Cloud Generative AI Leader", issuer: "Google Cloud", date: "Sept 2025", description: "Advanced certification in Generative AI technologies and applications" } ]; const coursework = [ "Object-Oriented Programming", "Data Structures & Algorithms", "Algorithm Design & Analysis", "Artificial Intelligence", "Database Systems", "Machine Learning" ]; return (
